fulltext:
NGUYEN THE TAI 
14/12/1987  
Birthday 
Gender 
Male    
Marriage 
Single 
Adress 
Van Dien - Thanh Tri - Hanoi 
Mobile 
090-3293-677 
Email 
taithenguyen.vn@gmail.com 
https://vn.linkedin.com/in/tainguyenthe
Linkedin
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
Being passionate on how technology make better life. Willing to approach, RnD, apply new 
technologies, new knowledges, new methods, other's experiences. 
Bring to customers, to users, to organizations or businesses not only products/services/solutions they 
need but also they want, they desire to take advantages, to optimize daily life activities or daily 
business activities. 
Have experienced in tech succeed startups - companies as VNG, Vatgia, Topica with a wide range of 
fields as Ecommerce, Online Education, Marketing as well as related built/founded projects/products 
from scratch.  
Desire to continuously develop products, services, businesses in Ecommerce, SaaS as well as 
Internet, Mobile services with huge potential and values. 
Career Path: 
Product/Services/Solution Manager 
Business Development Manager 
Product/Business Director 
Tech Business Building Consultant/Trainer. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Product Manager, Head of Department 
NovaonX Landingpage Department, Novaon Group, 2018 
NovaonX Landingpage product is a solution to create marketing landing pages for marketers. As 
a Software as a Service, categorized in Adtech, Marketing Automation. 
•Recruited and led team to build the product from scratch. Led team has 11 members : 5 
Developers, 2 Product designers, 2 Graphic & UI designers, 1 Tester, 1 customer services. 
•Built Product Strategy, Product Roadmap, Product Versions, User Growth Plan. Market Analysis, 
User Research & Personas, Product Desc & UX UI Design, Product Sprints.
The development managed with Agile Scrum via Jira Software. 
� of �
1
3
•Tech Stacks: Web application with React, Nodejs, MongoDB, GraphQL & Mobile web. 
Related tech: JqueryUI, VueJS, Php Laravel.  
Integrated with Google Drive, Gmail, Intercom, Facebook Messenger, Cloudinary, Sendgrid 
•Defined, managed product performance measurements & analytics 
•Coordinated with other managers (sales, marketing, cs) to go live the product & user growth 
•Researched, analyzed Marketing Automation Solutions (Mailchimp, Hubspot, Instapage, Spark,…) 
Senior Manager 
Topica English, Topica Edtech Group, 2015 - 2016. Founder-In-Residence Program 
1.
Developed Edumall VN (Vietnam market) 
Edumall is the biggest online course Marketplace, combined Online learning & E-commerce.  
•Managed Marketing team & Course Production team, specifying Marketing & Design Course 
Categories.  
•Marketing focus on ads via F acebook ads, Google adwords, GDN, Coccoc Banner, Admicro 
ADX  using landingpages to generate leads.  
•Managed Teacher Agent team to co-product courses with Experts (as instructors) in Marketing & 
Design fields. Partnership with Experts and share course revenue. 
•Led a team: 3 team leaders, 14 employees & collaborators 
2.
Expanded Topica Native into Indonesian market. 
•Built and Managed Operation Center including: Online Class Operation, International IT 
Systems, Student Advisor, Enroll Testing departments. 
•Been in BOD: doing strategy plan, expanding plan and general managing (sales, marketing, 
operation, tech, HR, legal, finance) 
•Led a team: 3 managers, 23 employees & collaborators. 
Operation Product Manager 
Fulfillment Services Division, Vatgia, VNP Group, 2014 - 2015 
FS is an E-commerce Operation service, manage fulfillment processes: confirm orders - pickup - 
packing - delivery - payment audit with merchants/sellers on vatgia.com ecommerce marketplace. 
Roles: Business Analyst - Assistant to Director - Operation Product Manager 
•Created, upgraded and deployed business processes, policies of FS division. 
•Managed development & deployment FS Operation Managing System based Odoo (OpenERP) 
enterprise solution. Integrated other Vatgia systems & Express firms. 
•Managed Account Management for merchants/sellers. Partnership with Merchants/Sellers 
•Managed Customer Care: Order confirmation, inbound & outbound call processing. 
•Led a team: 2 python developers, 3 account managers, 4 customer cares, 2 operation analysts 
Lead Software Engineer 
Game Studio North Department, VNG Corporation, 2010 - 2013 
� of �
2
3
•Game products : social casual game myFarm, myFish, Oh!Fish on Zingme 
•(IT)Managed development of game backend system: game logic, database storing. Managed 
development of log parsing systems for game metric.  
•Integrated Zingme/VNG platforms, monitoring system performance. 
SOCIAL ACTIVITIES 
•Program Leader, Project ‘Bring Internet to Villages’, VNIF Foundation, 2012 - 2013 
•Startup Ecosystem Builder, Vietnam Startup Community, 2013 - 2014 
•Consultant of Product Development & User Growth, 2017, 2018 : 2 mobile apps 
SKILLS 
•Manage & lead cross-functional teams, good coordination between relevant teams 
•Recruit & build a team with good experiences, learning attitudes & high engagement 
•Market Analysis, User Research. Product Strategy, Product Roadmap, UX UI.  
•Product Management, Project Management, IT/Tech Management 
•Business Development, Business Operation, Ecommerce Operation, Product Marketing, Customer 
Services, SaaS. 
•Passionate with tech products, tech startup, entrepreneurship 
•Good communication in English. 
EDUCATION 
Informatics, Nguyen Hue High School for Gifted Students, 2003-2006 
Software Engineering, Information Technology, Hanoi University of Science & Technology, 06 - 11 
30+ online courses of Product Management, Marketing, Entrepreneur, Tech Development 
OTHERS 
•Open-minded. Willing to learn, update new technologies, trends, new knowledges, experience 
•Word hard, enthusiasm style. High responsibility. Win with teamwork. 
•High appreciate innovative spirit, get things done, continuous improvement, sharing attitudes 
REFERENCE 
1.Mr. Nguyen Minh Quy, CEO Novaon Group. Tel: 0982-868-686 
2.Mr. Tran Thang, CEO Edumall. Tel: 0943-199-998 
3.Mr. Huynh Quang Trung, Former Director of FS, VNP Group. Tel: 0909-495-665

experiences.detail:
NovaonX Landingpage product is a solution to create marketing landing pages for marketers. As a Software as a Service, categorized in Adtech, Marketing Automation. •Recruited and led team to build the product from scratch. Led team has 11 members : 5 Developers, 2 Product designers, 2 Graphic & UI designers, 1 Tester, 1 customer services.
•Built Product Strategy, Product Roadmap, Product Versions, User Growth Plan. Market Analysis, User Research & Personas, Product Desc & UX UI Design, Product Sprints. The development managed with Agile Scrum via Jira Software. •Tech Stacks: Web application with React, Nodejs, MongoDB, GraphQL & Mobile web.
